original_text: I keep the snow and the hail ready to use. I use them in times of trouble and wars. I keep the snow and the hail ready to use. I use them in times of trouble and wars. I keep the snow and the hail ready to use. I use them in times of trouble and wars. I keep the snow and the hail ready to use.
korean_text: 내가 환난 때와 교전과 전쟁의 날을 위하여 이것을 남겨 두었노라

sentences.original_text: I keep the snow and the hail ready to use.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 눈과 우박을 사용할 준비가 되게 한다.

sentences.original_text: I use them in times of trouble and wars.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그것들을 고난과 전쟁의 때에 사용한다.

sentences.original_text: I keep the snow and the hail ready to use.
